One of my COVID patients, a young woman, miraculously survived weeks on a ventilator, ECMO, and a catastrophic bleed.

After days of delirium, her mind cleared and she could speak for the first time in a month. 

"I want to tell everyone," she said to me, "Stay the f*** at home."
